articles.title: Feds execute search warrant on new NYPD commissioner just over a week after he was appointed
articles.description: Just over a week after Thomas Donlon became Interim Police Commissioner of New York City, federal authorities executed a search warrant at his home on Friday, Donlon said in a statement Saturday night.
articles.content:
CNN —
Just over a week after Thomas Donlon became Interim Police Commissioner of New York City, federal authorities executed a search warrant at his home on Friday, Donlon said in a statement Saturday night.

articles.title: Interim Police Commissioner Thomas Donlon says home was searched
articles.description: Federal authorities are now investigating Interim Police Commissioner Thomas Donlon just days into the job.
articles.content:
Interim Police Commissioner Thomas Donlon says home was searched
NEW YORK (WABC) -- Federal authorities are now investigating Interim Police Commissioner Thomas Donlon just days into the job.

articles.title: Dan Evans, former Republican governor of Washington and US senator, dies at 98
articles.description: Dan Evans, a popular three-term Republican governor of Washington state who went on to serve in the US Senate before leaving in frustration because he felt the chamber was too rancorous and tedious, has died. He was 98.
articles.content:
CNN —
Dan Evans, a popular three-term Republican governor of Washington state who went on to serve in the US Senate before leaving in frustration because he felt the chamber was too rancorous and tedious, has died. He was 98.

articles.title: Erik Menendez Reacts to Ryan Murphy's Menendez Brothers Series
articles.description: Erik Menendez spoke against Ryan Murphy's latest season of Monsters, which is about his and his brother Lyle and their 1989 murder of their parents, for which they are serving life sentences.
articles.content:
Erik Menendez is speaking out against Ryan Murphy's series about him and his brother Lyle Menendez, who are serving life sentences for murdering their parents in 1989.

articles.title: Michigan scores late to defeat USC in physical Big Ten opener
articles.description: The No. 18 Wolverines' rushing attack rolls for 290 yards and three touchdowns, including one with 37 seconds left, against the No. 11 Trojans on Saturday.
articles.content:
Michigan running back Kalel Mullings, breaking into the clear on a 53-yard touchdown run, gained a career-high 15 yards against USC on Saturday in Ann Arbor.
It seemed, at first, like just the sort of old-fashioned Big Ten welcome that would have mad... [5126 chars]

articles.description: Janet Jackson questioned whether Democratic presidential nominee and Vice President Kamala Harris is Black in a new interview.

articles.title: Indo-Pacific leaders expand maritime security cooperation at Biden’s farewell summit
articles.description: Leaders of Australia, India, Japan and the United States announced plans for new security initiatives in the Indian Ocean, when outgoing President Joe Biden hosted counterparts from the Quad grouping established due to shared concerns about China.

articles.title: Menendez Brothers Slam ‘Ruinous’ Netflix Show’s Portrayal
articles.description: “How demoralizing to know that one man with power can undermine decades of progress,” wrote Erik Menendez about his depiction in the Ryan Murphy-produced “Monsters.”
articles.content:
The Menendez brothers have slammed Ryan Murphy’s new Netflix series, Monsters: The Lyle and Erik Menendez Story, for what they say are “awful lies” and “ruinous character portrayals” in the show.

articles.description: In an interview with The Guardian, Jackson postulated about Kamala Harris' family background, parroting right-wing talking points.
articles.content:
Janet Jackson knows a lot about Rhythm Nation, but she clearly doesn’t know anything about Vice President Kamala Harris‘ heritage.
